text: Digimon (Kanji: デジモン, Hepburn: Dejimon) is a Japanese media franchise made by Bandai. It features a group of digital creatures called Digimon. Humans befriend Digimon as partners and work with them to protect both worlds from enemies. The series has movies, manga, anime, toys, video games, Digital Pets and card games. == Characters == === Humans === *Kamiya Taichi *Kido Joe *Takenouchi Sora *Tachikawa Mimi == References == Category:Anime Category:1999 anime television series
title: Digimon
